title: 1.81组命令失效
author: xuyingchunok
txt_content:
1.81服务端控制台输入用户组命令，如：manselect world   都会提示  Bukkit sad. Bukkit want you to access command, but Bukkit cannot let you. Bukkit will leak tears 
请问如何解决？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
這帖子有提到解決方法, 4 樓的回答... 要登入該論壇才能下載... 自己去下吧... 
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads ... l-leak-tears.37647/

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
groupmanger_fixed.zip
(76.77 KB, 下载次数: 20)



2011-9-21 17:51 上传
点击文件名下载附件






我帮你下好了 感谢well的链接-.-
